title: Instructional Design for Overcoming Learning Obstacles in Elementary Fraction Problem-Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: A course for undergraduate office/administrative professionals to learn elementary mathematics education methodologies in simulation/VR environments, with a focus on enhancing instructional design competencies linked to language education domains.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze key obstacles to solving elementary fraction problems (conceptual limitations, operational errors, failure to apply to problems).
Learners can design instructional strategies to address fraction learning barriers through case studies and apply them in a simulated environment.
Learners can develop learner-customized fraction problem-solving scenarios through VR-based assessments and write project reports.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
